videos.author: LegenVD
videos.title: Eldrazi have a new best friend.
videos.description:
Magic: The Gathering Arena deck tech & gameplay with a colorless Eldrazi ramp deck, ft. Ugin, Eye of the Storms in Brawl.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/LegenVD

Colorless Brawl decks:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m-xyjiy0YPw
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sBINZbI21MI

27:04 - vs Yorion, Sky Nomad
48:25 - vs Chatterfang, Squirrel General
56:48 - vs Davriel, Soul Broker
1:04:41 - vs Lumra, Bellow of the Woods
1:10:49 - vs Nicol Bolas, the Ravager
